import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{CoursesService}from'./AdminServices';import LoadingSpinner from'../../components/shared/LoadingSpinner';import ErrorMessage from'../../components/shared/ErrorMessage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CoursesManagement=()=>{const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[selectedCourse,setSelectedCourse]=useState(null);const[formData,setFormData]=useState({title:'',university:'',description:'',duration:'',tuitionFee:'',requirements:'',image:'',featured:false});const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);// Load all courses on component mount
useEffect(()=>{const loadCourses=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const data=await CoursesService.getAllCourses();setCourses(data);setLoading(false);}catch(err){setError(err.message||'Failed to load courses');setLoading(false);}};loadCourses();},[]);// Handle form input changes
const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value,type,checked}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:type==='checkbox'?checked:value});};// Handle form submission
const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{setLoading(true);if(isEditing&&selectedCourse){// Update existing course
const updatedCourse=await CoursesService.updateCourse(selectedCourse._id,formData);setCourses(courses.map(course=>course._id===updatedCourse._id?updatedCourse:course));setIsEditing(false);setSelectedCourse(null);}else{// Create new course
const newCourse=await CoursesService.createCourse(formData);setCourses([...courses,newCourse]);}// Reset form
setFormData({title:'',university:'',description:'',duration:'',tuitionFee:'',requirements:'',image:'',featured:false});setLoading(false);}catch(error){toast.error(error.message||'Something went wrong');setLoading(false);}};// Handle edit course
const handleEdit=course=>{setSelectedCourse(course);setFormData({title:course.title,university:course.university,description:course.description,duration:course.duration,tuitionFee:course.tuitionFee,requirements:course.requirements,image:course.image,featured:course.featured});setIsEditing(true);};// Handle delete course
const handleDelete=async id=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this course?')){try{setLoading(true);await CoursesService.deleteCourse(id);setCourses(courses.filter(course=>course._id!==id));setLoading(false);}catch(error){toast.error(error.message||'Failed to delete course');setLoading(false);}}};// Cancel editing
const
